entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
